bottomActions.value: On the next six melee attacks targeting you, gain %game.action.retaliate:2%.

subActions.value: All adjacent allies and enemies suffer 1 damage.
All allies and enemies adjacent to the target suffer 1 damage.

bottomActions.value: All adjacent allies and enemies suffer 1 damage.

%game.condition.muddle% all allies and enemies in the targeted area.

bottomActions.value: Add +1 %game.action.attack% to all your ranged attacks this round.
Add +2 %game.action.attack% to all your melee attacks this round.

Affect all allies in the targeted area

actions.value: Move one adjacent single-hex obstacle to an empty hex within %game.action.range:4%.

subActions.value: Destroy all obstacles and disarm all traps moved through.

actions.value: Create three single-hex obstacles in empty hexes within %game.action.range:4%.

subActions.value: All allies and enemies adjacent to one or more created obstacles suffer 2 damage.
The movement must be in a straight line.
Create one single-hex obstacle in the hex in which the enemy died.

bottomActions.value: On your next four melee attacks when possible, destroy an adjacent obstacle to add +3 %game.action.attack%.

actions.value: Create one 2 damage %game.condition.stun% trap in a adjacent empty hex.

subActions.value: %game.condition.immobilize% all allies and enemies in the targeted area.

actions.value: Create one three-hex triangular obstacle in empty hexes within %game.action.range% 3.

subActions.value: Target all enemies adjacent to the obstacle.
For each hex you cannot push the target because of a wall or obstacle, the target suffers 2 damage and you gain %game.card.experience:1%.

bottomActions.value: At the start of your next five turns, perform a "%game.action.heal:2%, %game.action.range:2%" action.

subActions.value: All allies and enemies adjacent to the target suffer damage equal to the damage the target suffered.
